title: My vegan chocolate chip muffins
ingredients: ['110g self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons sugar or sugar replacement', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons vegan margarine', '3 teaspoons carbonated water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2-3 tablespoons soya yoghurt', 'handful chopped dairy free chocolate']
